img.alt: File:Flag of Italy.svg

div.p: Flag_of_Italy.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,500 × 1,000 pixels, file size: 273 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

table.style: background:#fff; border:1px solid #aaa; padding:.2em; margin:.5em auto;

td.b: This media file has been protected from editing to prevent vandalism.
td.span: Please discuss changes on the talk page or request unprotection.

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.span: Flag of Italy.svg

a.title: th:ธงชาติอิตาลี

div.a: ธงชาติอิตาลี

table.style: border:2px solid #d3d3d3; background-color:white; clear: both; margin: 0.5em auto; width:100%; text-align:center; cellpadding:0px; direction:ltr;

tr.td: It is easy to put a border around this image:

img.alt: Flag of Italy.svg

p.span: العربية | Беларуская (тарашкевіца) | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Galego | Hrvatski | Magyar | Հայերեն | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | Bahasa Melayu | Malti | Nederlands | ‪Norsk (bokmål)‬ | Polski | Português | Runa Simi | Română | Русский | Slovenčina | Српски / Srpski | Svenska | Türkçe | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | +/−

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.p: There has been a long discussion on the colors of this flag. Please read the talk page before editing or reverting this image. Pantone to RGB performed by http://www.pantone.com/pages/pantone/colorfinder.aspx

td.span: Public domain
Public domain
false
false

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

img.alt: Public domain

td.i: This image of simple geometry is ineligible for copyright and therefore in the public domain, because it consists entirely of information that is common property and contains no original authorship.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

a.title: File:Flag of the Kingdom of the Two Sicilies (1860).svg

li.a: Image:Flag of the Kingdom of the Two Sicilies (1860).svg

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:37, 23 November 2009

td.span: (reduce code)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 00:29, 1 December 2007

td.span: (I proposed an agreement, we should stick to that. Colors back to ffffff)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 03:27, 29 November 2007

td.span: (switch to colors legislated by the Italian government http://www.governo.it/Presidenza/cerimoniale/varie/dpcm_cerimoniale140406.pdf)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:14, 9 July 2007

td.span: (Green and red changed, white is still at fffff (Italian Gov't never replied to my letters))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:21, 28 March 2007

td.span: (Simplified code, and did *not* change colours.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:58, 31 July 2006

td.span: (version using "#ffffff" for the central band, for the Pantone ("#fafeff") versione see Image:Printabel_Flag_of_Italy.svg)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:01, 31 July 2006

td.span: (Reisio, I think they are right on this one. The Government is very quiet, so for right now, I am going to FFFFFF. We got bigger fish to try right now, so let's come back to this later.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 03:35, 12 February 2006

td.span: (the previous version was invalid SVG. Fixed. Colors are the same: #008d46, #fafeff, #d2232c)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 02:26, 12 February 2006

td.span: (Fix phantom borders)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 02:22, 12 February 2006

td.span: (Enlarge intrinsic size)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:32, 31 January 2006

td.span: (change colors to #008d46, #f3f2ef, and #d2232c, according to the talk page. Apparently the Pantone colors changed)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:33, 27 January 2006

td.span: (scale up more, so it fills the image description page. Also change colors back to #008966, #eff0ef, #cf2b3b according to talk page)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:29, 10 January 2006

td.span: (Cleaned up source based on current version; size increased.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:47, 22 December 2005

td.span: (Federicks asked me to use #FAFAEC for the white, #cf2b3b for the red. While I am not sure what the difference between the SVG coding is, but I will welcome to learn it and use it for future drawings.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:31, 22 December 2005

td.span: (Recoded my flag using notepad and the colors agreed upon at the talk page.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 13:49, 20 December 2005

td.span: (simplify, add some info)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:02, 17 December 2005

td.span: (cleanup markup)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 15:35, 17 December 2005

td.span: (switching back to #008966, #eff0ef, #cf2b3b (which is what zscout had for white & red) / afaik these are the correct hex approximations for the pantone colors)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 14:00, 9 December 2005

td.span: (Color-improved version ;))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 10:35, 21 November 2005
Thumbnail for version as of 03:16, 16 October 2005

td.span: (Image compression)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:22, 9 October 2005

td.span: (I have changed the image to the official colors.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 05:02, 28 September 2005

td.span: (The flag of Italy. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of Italy)
